# ryanfuhrman-website
This is the repo for my personal website: [ryanfuhrman.me](https://www.ryanfuhrman.me/). The site was built using: react and styled-components, and is powered by [Gatsbyjs](https://www.gatsby.org).

## Development

Clone the repo: `git clone https://github.com/ryanfuhrman/ryanfuhrman-website.git`

Navigate into the directory `cd ryanfuhrman-website`

Install dependencies `npm install` or `npm i`

Start up the client `npm run develop`

Open the site in your browswer: `localhost:8000`
